document_data.mainbody:
Jalaerho Kloskurmrundur was the Guildmaster Emeritus of the Stationers Guild of Waterdeep in the late-14 century DR.
By the , Jalaerho had been the Guildmaster Emeritus for over ten years. He wrote down his musings and experiences in a book published in 1378 DR. His work was dramatically named A Seat That Draws Blood Ten Years a Guildmaster and Jalaerhoe proclaimed his unfavorable attitude towards change and rebellious youth while stressing the importance of business and coin it brought.
